Hong Kong has recently developed into a serious flashpoint in East Asia, I think we should aim to reduce the spread of misinformation regarding Hong Kong. Hong Kong is a sovereign territory of China (People's Republic) but it has high autonomy under international law, guaranteed until 2047.9322653292019122416082019-12-2416:08Kiteinthewind0Reverted good faith edits by Jargo Nautilus: If people read nothing but the short description of a long article on Wikipedia, then it is their problem.
